lines: You are sitting in a large place and a furry man walks up to you. He's walking around you in circles.
#MAKE NOISES AT/ TALK TO THE FURRY MAN
#MAKE NOISES AT/ TALK TO THE FURRY MAN

Hey! That man just licked your finger. His head is big and furry and his tongue is sticking out of his mouth. He makes a sound that goes like this: "Huh, huh, huh," very fast. He comes over and sits on your leg.
You grab his head between your two hands. Hey! Now that man is licking you all over the face. Mommy says he's "kissing" you.
#LICK THE FURRY MAN IN THE FACE
His nose is cold and the hairs tickle your face. He tastes very salty and has bad breath.
This man is heavy! (This is good exercise.) He looks back at you while you are pushing him off and blows his nose right in your face.
You yell out to the furry man and he walks over to you. He makes a noise that sounds like this: "Roooouf." Then he sits on your leg.
#GRAB THE FURRY MAN BY THE HEAD
The furry man walks right up to you and smells you up and down. His nose pokes into your face and neck. It's cold.
#GRAB THE FURRY MAN BY THE HEAD
Your mom comes over and says the furry man is just playing. She takes your hand and puts it on the furry man's back and says, "Nice 'doggie'."
#STAY FRIGHTENED AND GO AWAY FROM THE MAN
See? It isn't that bad. You pound on the man's back and say, "Nice 'doo-gee'."
You do seem to like running... this will serve you well when you get older. You run away but the man follows you. He thinks you want to play. Your mom takes the man away.

You scream (not a real scream, just to let the man know to stay away). The man yells back: "Rowf! rowf! rowf!" His noises are much louder than yours. They scare you even more. He comes right up next to you.
#GRAB THE FURRY MAN BY THE HEAD
